item.title: 'Rajiv Kapoor was addicted to alcohol, I'd spoken to him a day before his death,' reveals actress Khushbu - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Khushbu Sundar Opens Up About Rajiv Kapoor's Alcohol Struggles Before His Death

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

Actress Khushbu Sundar revealed that she had spoken to Rajiv Kapoor just a day before his untimely death, disclosing that he had struggled with alcohol addiction.

  • Khushbu was set to star alongside Kapoor in 'Ram Teri Ganga Maili'.
  • She expressed her shock at his passing and reflected on their last conversation.
  • Rajiv Kapoor was known for his legacy in the film industry and faced personal challenges throughout his life.
“He was addicted to alcohol,” Khushbu stated, sharing her concerns for him.

The conversation sheds light on the personal battles faced by many in the film industry, highlighting the need for support and understanding.

item.title: Celebrity stylist Tanya Ghavri reveals Kareena Kapoor 'walks and talks luxury'; Katrina Kaif is 'a Perfec - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Celebrity stylist Tanya Ghavri reveals Kareena Kapoor 'walks and talks luxury'; Katrina Kaif is 'a Perfectionist'

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

Tanya Ghavri, a renowned celebrity stylist, shares insights on Bollywood stars Kareena Kapoor and Katrina Kaif, highlighting their unique styles and the essence they bring to luxury.

  • Kareena Kapoor is described as embodying luxury in her presence.
  • Katrina Kaif is praised for her perfectionism in both fashion and on-screen roles.
“Kareena walks and talks luxury,” said Ghavri. “Katrina is truly a perfectionist.”

This discussion sheds light on the evolving standards of beauty and luxury in the Indian film industry, reflecting broader cultural trends.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 28 (Early Trends): Allu Arjun Only 3.75 Crore Away From The Biggest Milestone Of Hindi Cinema! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 28 (Early Trends): Allu Arjun Only 3.75 Crore Away From The Biggest Milestone

Date: January 2, 2025 | Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2 Hindi has witnessed another strong day at the box office, reaching an estimated total of 796.25 crore in 28 days. The film is only 3.75 crore away from hitting the 800 crore mark, a significant milestone in Hindi Cinema.

  • On Day 28, the film earned between 3.5 to 4 crore.
  • Despite a drop from the New Year’s collection of 10 crore, it stays on track for more records.
  • Week-wise earnings show a robust performance, with a total of 796.25 crore estimated.
  • The film is witnessing the biggest fourth-week box office collection at an estimated 56 crore, 48% higher than the previous record.
“The fourth week of Pushpa 2 has finally ended at an estimated 56 crore at the box office.”

Overall, Pushpa 2 continues to perform exceptionally well, maintaining strong attendance rates and inching ever closer to record-breaking achievements in Hindi cinema.

item.title: Dinesh Vijan reveals release dates of 'Bhediya 2', 'Stree 3', and 'Munjya 2' from the horror comedy unive - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Dinesh Vijan reveals release dates of 'Bhediya 2', 'Stree 3', and 'Munjya 2'

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The horror comedy universe expands with new sequels and spin-offs, generating excitement among fans.

  • Upcoming films from 2025 to 2028 include 'Thama', 'Shakti Shalini', 'Bhediya 2', 'Stree 3', and 'Munjya 2'.
  • 'Thama' will kick off the series in 2025, with notable stars Ayushmann Khurrana and Rashmika Mandanna.
  • 'Bhediya 2' is set for an August 14, 2026 release, followed by 'Chamunda' on December 4, 2026.
  • 'Stree 3', starring Shraddha Kapoor, is scheduled for August 13, 2027.
  • The series will conclude with two films on August 11 and October 18, 2028.
“Ab aaya hamara MARVEL-lous schedule!” - Fan Comment

This lineup is being likened to Marvel's cinematic offerings, with fans eager for the upcoming releases.

item.title: Dinesh Vijan reveals release dates of 'Bhediya 2', 'Stree 3', and 'Munjya 2' from the horror comedy unive - The Times of India
item.description:
Dinesh Vijan reveals release dates of 'Bhediya 2', 'Stree 3', and 'Munjya 2'

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

Popular filmmaker Dinesh Vijan announced the release dates for the upcoming sequels in the horror comedy universe, captivating fans who are excited for the next installments.

  • 'Bhediya 2' is set to release in 2025.
  • 'Stree 3' will be hitting theaters in 2026.
  • Fans are eagerly engaging on social media, referencing Vijan's cinematic universe.
“Marvel who?” tweeted an enthusiastic fan in response to the announcement.

This series of sequels promises to continue the blend of horror and comedy that has resonated with audiences, potentially expanding the genre's appeal in Indian cinema.

item.title: Jennifer Lopez relates to her Unstoppable character's ‘challenging relationships’ amid divorce from Ben Affleck - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Jennifer Lopez relates to her Unstoppable character Judy Robles, sharing similarities in their challenging relationships amid split with Ben Affleck.

Date: Jan 02, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

In a new interview, Jennifer Lopez revealed that she strongly found her character from Unstoppable, Judy Robles’s “challenging relationships” relatable. She mentioned a connection with her character amidst her divorce from Ben Affleck.

  • Lopez described shared experiences with Judy Robles, emphasizing their Latina backgrounds and motherhood.
  • Amid her divorce, she appreciates the strength that relationships require.
  • Despite the split, Lopez and Affleck maintain a cooperative relationship for their families.
“We both grew up Latina in this country. We both had children and had hopes and dreams for them. We both had challenging relationships.”

Lopez continues to navigate her personal challenges while finding solace in her character's strength, illustrating the complexities of love and motherhood.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj: Dabidi Dibidi dance steps become a hot topic - 123telugu
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj: Dabidi Dibidi Dance Steps Become a Hot Topic

Published on: Jan 2, 2025 10:00 pm IST

Daaku Maharaaj is set to hit the screens on January 12, 2025. Thaman has composed the music for this film, and a new song, Dabidi Dabidi, was launched today.

  • Balakrishna’s dance steps in the new song have become a talking point.
  • Choreographed by Sekhar Master, the dance features energetic mass steps.
  • Social media buzzes with clips from the song, receiving both praise and trolling.
  • Urvashi Rautela plays the female lead and is noted for her stunning appearance.
“Whatever Balayya does grabs attention, and the same holds for this song.”

The song is generating significant excitement ahead of the film's release.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18 Winner POLL: Which contestant among the top 10 deserves to win Salman Khan's show? Karan Veer Mehra, Vivian Dsena and more; VOTE - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18 Winner POLL: Which contestant among the top 10 deserves to win Salman Khan's show?

Updated on Jan 02, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

As Bigg Boss 18 approaches its grand finale, Pinkvilla invites fans to participate in a poll to vote for the contestant they believe deserves to win.

  • The final month of Bigg Boss 18 includes a poll for the top 10 contestants.
  • Contestants like Karan Veer Mehra, Vivian Dsena, and others are highlighted.
  • Voting is crucial as the show nears its conclusion, with only one contestant ultimately winning.
  • The finale airs soon, and results from this poll will be revealed on January 5.
"Vote for your favorite contestant who you think deserves to win Bigg Boss 18!"

This exciting voting opportunity adds to the anticipation surrounding the Bigg Boss 18 finale.

item.title: Maddock unveils MCU-style slate for horror-comedy universe; release date for Stree 3, Thama announced - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Maddock unveils MCU-style slate for horror-comedy universe; release date for Stree 3, Thama announced

Date: January 2, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

The ambitious horror-comedy cinematic universe from Maddock Films is set to launch in 2025 with the release of Thama featuring Ayushmann Khurrana as a vampire, followed by a lineup of interconnected films.

  • The universe kicks off in 2025 with Thama, releasing during the Diwali holiday.
  • Shakti Shalini will follow on December 31, 2025.
  • Bhediya 2 and Chamunda will be released in 2026.
  • Stree 3, featuring Rajkummar Rao and Shraddha Kapoor, is scheduled for August 13, 2027.
  • The saga concludes in 2028 with back-to-back releases of Pehla Mahayudh and Doossra Mahayudh.
“Our mission at Maddock has always been to innovate and entertain,” said Dinesh Vijan.

The new horror-comedy universe promises to create compelling stories rooted in Indian culture, aiming to resonate deeply with audiences.

item.title: Shikhar Dhawan is divorced, Huma Qureshi is also single, both are from Delhi, are they dating each other? - India.com
item.description:
Shikhar Dhawan is divorced, Huma Qureshi is also single, both are from Delhi, are they dating each other?

Publication Date: Not specified Source: India.com

In light of their recent single statuses, rumors have emerged about potential romance between cricketer Shikhar Dhawan and actress Huma Qureshi, following their collaboration in the film 'Double XL'.

  • Shikhar Dhawan finalized his divorce from Ayesha Mukherjee in 2023 after living separately since 2020.
  • Huma Qureshi recently ended her relationship with director Mudassar Aziz in 2022.
  • There are no confirmed reports of a romantic relationship between Dhawan and Qureshi.
  • Photos and stories circulating about their relationship have been debunked as manipulated or fabricated.
  • The two are from Delhi and share a professional connection, but no personal relationship has been established.
No, they are not dating. The reason for the rumors stems from their professional collaboration.

The speculation about Shikhar Dhawan and Huma Qureshi dating appears to be unfounded. Both are single, but they remain focused on their respective careers.

item.title: Ranbir Kapoor kisses Alia Bhatt as they enjoy New Year getaway with Raha in Thailand. See pics - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ranbir Kapoor kisses Alia Bhatt as they enjoy New Year getaway with Raha in Thailand. See pics

Date: January 2, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Alia Bhatt shared heartwarming pictures from her New Year's getaway in Thailand with Ranbir Kapoor and their daughter Raha, capturing special moments and family time.

  • Alia posted joyous images from the trip, with Raha's expressions amusing fans.
  • The getaway included beautiful views, family moments, and a special New Year's celebration.
  • Fans expressed their love for Raha in the comments on Alia's Instagram posts.
  • The family appeared alongside relatives, highlighting their joyous vacation.
“Raha is the cutest,” read one comment, while another said, “Raha finally decided to show her face on camera.”

The Kapoor family created lasting memories together during their holiday, bringing joy to their fans.

item.title: Keerthy Suresh recalls father’s reaction to Christian wedding ceremony: ‘I never thought he would say…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh recalls father’s reaction to Christian wedding ceremony: ‘I never thought he would say…’

Publication Date: December 2023
Source: Indian Express

Actor Keerthy Suresh tied the knot with her longtime boyfriend, Antony Thattil, in a traditional ceremony followed by a white wedding. She shared her emotional journey, her father’s supportive role in her wedding, and reflections on their long-distance relationship.

  • Keerthy and Antony had been in a long-distance relationship for 5-6 years.
  • Her father participated in the Christian wedding ceremony, surprising her with his willingness to walk her down the aisle.
  • Keerthy reflected on her father's support and how she sees his qualities in Antony.
  • The couple’s weddings took place in Goa, first in a South Indian style and then Christian style shortly after.
“Dads are supposed to walk the bride down the aisle, will you do that for me? He replied, ‘Ya, why not?... I never thought he would say ok to it and I am really happy he did that for me.”

In conclusion, Keerthy Suresh’s wedding journey highlighted the importance of family support and the blending of traditions during significant life events.

item.title: Game Changer: Date and place announced for the pre-release event - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer: Date and place announced for the pre-release event

Published on: January 2, 2025 9:12 pm IST

It’s known that the pre-release event of Ram Charan and Shankar’s Game Changer will be graced by Powerstar and AP Deputy CM Pawan Kalyan. Film producer Dil Raju personally met the star actor and invited him to the event. There has been some confusion about the event date, but according to the latest update, it will take place on January 4 in Rajamundry.

  • The hype around this political action drama is expected to increase with the pre-release event.
  • Charan and team will promote Game Changer in North before the event in AP.
  • The theatrical trailer promises a solid entertainer for the Sankranthi season.
  • Game Changer will hit the big screens on January 10, 2025.
“The theatrical trailer that was launched today promised a solid entertainer for the Sankranthi season.”

It remains to be seen if Megastar Chiranjeevi will also attend the event.

item.title: Who is Sivasri Skandaprasad? Singer reportedly engaged to BJP's Tejasvi Surya - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Who is Sivasri Skandaprasad? Singer reportedly engaged to BJP's Tejasvi Surya

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Hindustan Times

Sivasri Skandaprasad, a noted classical singer recognized for her work in 'Ponniyin Selvan', has attracted attention due to her rumored engagement with BJP leader Tejasvi Surya, although neither party has confirmed the news.

  • Sivasri, born on August 1, 1996, is the daughter of Mridangam maestro Seerkazhi Sri J Skandaprasad.
  • She is both a Carnatic singer and a performing Bharatanatyam artist with multiple accolades.
  • Sivasri is a bio-engineering graduate and has a diploma in Ayurvedic cosmetology.
  • She is the founder of 'Ahuti', a platform aimed at promoting Indian art forms and inclusive education.
  • Her contribution to Carnatic music includes performances in prestigious venues and accompanied notable Bharatanatyam dancers.
  • Awarded several titles, including 'Bharata Kala Choodamani' for her significant contributions to the arts.
  • Gained recognition after Prime Minister Modi praised her rendition of a Kannada Ram bhajan.
“Dear Modi ji, Thank you so much. This is really big for a humble artiste like me. Thank you for encouraging us to constantly strive towards serving Bharat and continue our spiritual journey.”

With her multifaceted talents and contributions, Sivasri Skandaprasad continues to inspire many in the realm of Indian classical arts.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj Faces Backlash for His Dance Moves - M9
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj Faces Backlash for His Dance Moves

Publication Date: Not specified Source: M9 News

The newly released song Dabidi Dibidi from Balakrishna’s upcoming film Daaku Maharaaj has sparked controversy due to its criticized dance moves.

  • The choreography by Shekhar Master has drawn significant backlash.
  • Fans feel the dance moves do not align with Balakrishna's age and stature.
  • Anti-fans and Tamil fans have amplified criticism through social media.
  • Director Bobby Kolli faces scrutiny for not aligning the choreography with Balakrishna's public image.
  • Balakrishna is recognized for choosing age-appropriate roles in his career.
  • The film is set to release on January 12 for Sankranti.
“No justification or explanation will defend the approval of such dance moves at this time.”

This backlash highlights the importance of maintaining a consistent public image, especially for prominent figures in the film industry.

item.title: Justin Baldoni's former agency refutes dropping him under Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds' pressure - Hindustan Times
item.description:
WME claims it did not drop Justin Baldoni due to Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds after Lively accused him of harassment.

January 02, 2025, Source: Hindustan Times

Justin Baldoni’s former agency, WME, insisted that they did not drop the actor and director because of Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds after Lively filed a lawsuit accusing Baldoni of sexual harassment.

  • WME states no pressure came from Lively or Reynolds when Baldoni was dropped.
  • Baldoni filed a $250 million lawsuit against The New York Times following coverage of Lively's complaint.
  • The lawsuit alleges Lively sabotaged Baldoni's role and participation in a film premiere.
  • Lively's attorney claims the lawsuit has no bearing on existing allegations against Baldoni.
WME: "This is not true. Baldoni’s former representative was not at the Deadpool & Wolverine premiere nor was there any pressure from Reynolds or Lively to drop Baldoni as a client."

The unfolding legal battle highlights ongoing tensions between the actors, as Baldoni seeks to clear his name amidst serious allegations.

item.title: Diljit Dosanjh Praises Indian Diversity In Chat With PM Modi: 'We Can Host Events Bigger Than Coachella’ - News18

item.title: Jennifer Aniston offers to help Selena Gomez in wedding planning: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Jennifer Aniston Offers Wedding Planning Help to Selena Gomez

Date: Jan 02, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

As Selena Gomez prepares for her wedding to Benny Blanco, reports suggest she is receiving support from her close friend Jennifer Aniston, who is offering her wedding planning expertise.

  • Jennifer Aniston and Selena Gomez share the same manager and have been friends since they met at a Vanity Fair event.
  • Jennifer is reportedly providing advice on navigating married life and planning celebrity weddings.
  • Sources indicate that Aniston is excited and has already sent flowers to Gomez.
  • The wedding is expected to have a significant number of celebrity guests.
“Jennifer treats Selena like a younger sister. She’s very excited for her and has already sent flowers and a card offering to help out however she can.”

In conclusion, Jennifer Aniston's support for Selena Gomez as she prepares for her wedding signifies a strong friendship and highlights the unique challenges of planning a celebrity wedding.

item.title: Game Changer X Review: Netizens Demand National Award For Ram Charan, Call Shankar's Film 'Mega Blockbuster' - Times Now
item.description:
Game Changer X Review: Netizens Demand National Award For Ram Charan, Call Shankar's Film 'Mega Blockbuster'

Publication Date: Today | Source: TNN

The much-anticipated Game Changer trailer was unveiled today, featuring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani in a political drama filled with action and romance. The film is set to release in less than 10 days.

Key Points

  • Trailer showcases intense action and vibrant scenes.
  • Netizens are praising Ram Charan's performance and visual quality.
  • The film follows an IAS officer's journey against political corruption.
  • Produced by Dil Raju, it will be released in Telugu, Tamil, and Hindi on January 10, 2025.
  • Approx. Rs 75 crore spent on four songs from the film.

Notable Quotes or Statistics

“National Award Frame” - A fan's comment
“Grand visuals, electrifying music, and #RamCharan ruling it all!”

Conclusion

With overwhelming anticipation and praise on social media, Game Changer is positioned to be a significant release in early 2025, highlighting Ram Charan's star power and the production team's efforts.

item.title: KVN & Thespian Team Up for Malayalam Spectacle.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
KVN Productions & Thespian Films Team Up for Malayalam Spectacle

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Great Andhra

KVN Productions, under the leadership of Mr. Venkat K Narayana, partners with Thespian Films, led by Mrs. Shailaja Desai Fenn, uniting notable talents in Malayalam cinema.

  • Director Chidambaram and writer Jithu Madhavan lead the new project.
  • The film boasts a talented crew: Shyju Khaled (Director of Photography), Sushin Shyam (Music Director), and Vivek Harshan (Editor).
  • Mr. Venkat K Narayana emphasizes the goal of redefining cinema across languages.
  • Director Chidambaram expresses excitement about this collaboration.
  • The film represents KVN Production's foray into the Malayalam film industry, among various other projects planned for 2025.
“Our vision has always been to redefine cinema across languages.” - Mr. Venkat K Narayana

This collaboration marks a significant step for KVN Productions as it continues to build its reputation in the entertainment industry.

item.title: Check out: Third song from ‘Daaku Maharaaj’, titled ‘Dabidi Dibidi’, is out now - Telangana Today
item.description:
Check out: Third song from ‘Daaku Maharaaj’, titled ‘Dabidi Dibidi’, is out now

Published Date: 2 January 2025, Source: Telangana Today

The much-anticipated third song from ‘Daaku Maharaaj’, titled ‘Dabidi Dibidi’, has been unveiled and is creating a buzz on social media. A lavish mass dance number, it pays tribute to the legendary dialogues of Nandamuri Balakrishna.

  • Vagdevi’s vibrant vocals enhance the track.
  • The lyrics blend Balakrishna’s iconic monologues with dynamic music by S Thaman.
  • The song features high-energy performances by Balakrishna and Urvashi Rautela.
  • Rich visuals and choreography create a larger-than-life experience.
  • The film is set to release on January 12, 2025.
“Set to become the next ‘Jai Balayya’ for fans.”

‘Daaku Maharaaj’ promises a grand cinematic experience, blending action and heartfelt emotions.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Day 29: Can Allu Arjun movie cross ₹2,000 crore mark with THIS collection on Jan 2 | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Day 29: Can Allu Arjun movie cross ₹2,000 crore mark with THIS collection on Jan 2

Publication Date: January 2, 2023   Source: Live Mint

Pushpa 2 continues to perform impressively at the box office, nearing its one-month mark with significant collections.

  • The movie collected ₹2.69 crore net on Day 29, bringing its total domestic earnings to ₹1187.44 crore.
  • Worldwide gross stands at ₹1679 crore, with ₹266.25 crore from overseas and ₹1412.75 crore from the domestic market.
  • The film achieved the fastest crossing of the ₹1,700 crore mark within 25 days.
  • It is a major hit in the Hindi market, grossing ₹9.5 crore net from its Hindi version on the same day.
“Pushpa 2 is now the second highest grosser of Indian cinema after Dangal.”

Despite competition from new releases, Pushpa 2 maintains strong box office performance, along with a star-studded cast and extensive runtime.

item.title: Ben Affleck reaches out to hypnotist quit smoking amid divorce from Jennifer Lopez: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ben Affleck Reaches Out to Hypnotist to Quit Smoking Amid Divorce from Jennifer Lopez

Publication Date: Jan 02, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Ben Affleck is reportedly seeking to quit smoking as he navigates the stress of his ongoing divorce from Jennifer Lopez. A source reveals that he has reached out to a hypnotherapist for assistance.

  • Affleck has been chain-smoking amid the stress of his divorce from Lopez.
  • He successfully quit smoking in 2005 with the help of hypnosis.
  • Photographed chain-smoking after Lopez filed for divorce.
  • Affleck is determined to begin 2025 smoke-free and has booked a hypnotherapy session.
“Ben was so happy 20 years ago when he quit. He swore he'd never go back, but here he is just as addicted as ever and desperate to stop.”

The story highlights Affleck's struggle with smoking due to stress from his divorce, emphasizing his commitment to quit again with professional help.

item.title: BREAKING! Stree 3, Bhediya 2, Thama, and other five films of Maddocks horror-comedy universe get release dates; deets inside - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
BREAKING! Stree 3, Bhediya 2, Thama, and other five films of Maddock’s horror-comedy universe get release dates; deets inside

Publication Date: Not Specified Source: Bollywood Hungama

Maddock Films, led by producer Dinesh Vijan, has announced an ambitious slate of eight theatrical releases from their highly anticipated Maddock Horror-Comedy Universe (MHCU). The lineup is set to deliver a thrilling mix of laughter, spooks, and chills from 2025 to 2028.

Key Release Dates:

  • 2025:
    • Thama: Diwali 2025
    • Shakti Shalini: December 31, 2025
  • 2026:
    • Bhediya 2: August 14, 2026
    • Chamunda: December 4, 2026
  • 2027:
    • Stree 3: August 13, 2027
    • Maha Munjya: December 24, 2027
  • 2028:
    • Pehla Mahayudh: August 11, 2028
    • Doosara Mahayudh: October 11, 2028
Dinesh Vijan's Maddock Films is carving a niche in the Indian film industry with its genre-blending horror-comedies.

This carefully curated lineup aims to enhance the cinematic experience with interconnected narratives across eight films.

item.title: ‘Rakul Preet Singh-Bhumi Pednekar will dump Arjun Kapoor and get together’: Fans guess plot of Mere Husband Ki Biwi - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Fans Speculate Romance in 'Mere Husband Ki Biwi' Starring Rakul Preet Singh and Bhumi Pednekar

Date: Jan 02, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The announcement of the film 'Mere Husband Ki Biwi' has sparked speculation among fans, predicting a romantic dynamic between Rakul Preet Singh and Bhumi Pednekar, potentially leaving Arjun Kapoor's character heartbroken.

  • The film features a unique love circle motif rather than a traditional love triangle, as depicted in its motion poster.
  • Fans are drawing comparisons to previous films and predicting plot twists centered around the two female leads.
  • Netizens are actively discussing theories about the storyline, showcasing significant engagement even before the trailer's release.
“Maybe Rakul and Bhumi are the final pairing, leaving Arjun alone,” shared one fan on social media.

The film is set to release in theaters on February 21, 2025, creating buzz surrounding its potential narrative twists.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Maddock Films set for horror comedy universe with 8 films lined up from 2025 to 2028; Shakti Shalini & Chamunda are 2 new entrants - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Maddock Films Announces Ambitious Horror Comedy Universe with 8 Films from 2025 to 2028

Publication Date: January 02, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Maddock Films is setting the stage for an interconnected horror-comedy superhero universe over the next four years, introducing eight films from 2025 to 2028, including new titles Thama, Shakti Shalini, and Chamunda.

  • 2025 will see the release of Thama on Diwali and Shakti Shalini on December 31.
  • 2026 will bring Bhediya 2 on August 14 and Chamunda on December 4.
  • 2027 will feature Stree 3 on August 13 and Mahamunjya on December 24.
  • 2028 will culminate in the releases of Pehla Mahayudh on August 11 and Doosra Mahayudh during the Diwali period on October 18.
“Our mission at Maddock has always been to innovate and entertain... a cinematic universe that brings unforgettable characters and their stories to life like never before.” - Dinesh Vijan

Maddock Films aims to reshape the future of Hindi cinema by blending heritage with innovation through its ambitious horror-comedy universe.

item.title: Marco Box Office Day 14 Prediction (Hindi): Unni Mukundan’s Film To Have Steady Growth; To Cross 5Cr Today - Filmibeat
item.description:
Marco Box Office Day 14 Prediction (Hindi): Unni Mukundan’s Film To Have Steady Growth; To Cross 5Cr Today

Published: Thursday, January 2, 2025, 18:03 [IST]

Unni Mukundan's film Marco, directed by Haneed Adeni, has gained significant attention and is expected to achieve steady growth at the box office. The film has performed well in the Hindi market despite competition.

  • Marco is an action thriller and the most violent film in Indian Cinema.
  • It opened to rave reviews in both Malayalam and Hindi markets.
  • The film recorded the highest single-day collection of Rs 1.15 crores on day 13.
  • It is projected to cross Rs 5 crores by the end of day 14.
“The Censor team has not fully cut down the violence. They have only reduced the brutality.” - Shareef Muhammed, Producer

The sustained interest and positive reception indicate that Marco is set for a successful run at the box office.
